mapper.insert: insert into worktime (emp_num, workdate, worktime_go, worktime_out, worktime_hours) values (#{emp_num}, now(), #{worktime_go}, #{worktime_out}, #{worktime_hours});
mapper.select: select E.emp_num, E.emp_name, E.position_grade, D.dept_name, V.used_count, V.available_count from employee E join vacation_days V on E.emp_num = V.emp_num join department D on E.dept_code = D.dept_code where E.emp_num = #{emp_num};

select E.emp_name, E.position_grade, D.dept_name, E.emp_num from employee E join department D on E.dept_code = D.dept_code
where emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or dept_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
where emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
where dept_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by emp_name desc, emp_num desc
